title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
Your next main interaction with Astarion will be at the camp. You will wake up to Astarion hovering over you then a cutscene will begin. You will realize that he is a vampire. You have three options to proceed. You can give him a chance to explain or attack.

I can't believe I didn't see it - we even found the boar you snacked on. How long since you killed someone? Days? Hours? [MELEE ATTACK] Pick up a stake and lunge at the monster.
